sentences.sContent: Then Ky-Phuong Luong, the T.A., stirred a wok full of vegetables and soy-marinated crickets, and Dunkel passed a plate of fritters with yellowish wax worms protruding from their centers.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then Ky-Phuong Luong, the T.A., stirred a wok full of vegetables and soy-marinated crickets, and Dunkel passed a plate of fritters with yellowish wax worms protruding from their centers.
sentences.sCn: 然后名叫罗芳婉的班主任老师炒了锅菜满是蔬菜和过了酱的蟋蟀，接着邓克尔端上一盘油炸面团，内馅儿是蜡蠕虫，一些淡黄的的蠕虫凸出面团。

trans.tranOther: a wide pan shaped like a bowl, used in Chinese cooking
